long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This open-source extension includes the following features:

- Displays answer on Edunext
- Displays responses from ChatGPT alongside search results from popular search engines
- Supports all major search engines, such as Google, Bing, and DuckDuckGo
- Supports the official OpenAI API (GPT-3)
- Provides access to ChatGPT from the extension popup
- Renders markdown for easier readability
- Highlights code for improved clarity
- Offers a dark mode for easier viewing in low-light environments
- Allows users to provide feedback to improve the quality of ChatGPT responses
- Provides a custom trigger mode for users to choose when to activate the extension.
